snippet: Many of the youngest leaders of the Republican Party are embracing views on some social issues that are at odds with traditional conservative ideology.
abstract: Many young leaders of the Republican Party, in a break from generations past, are embracing views on some social issues that are at odds with traditional conservative ideology, if they mention such issues at all; some social conservatives say they are deliberately playing down their own views, which can be liberal, on issues as a tactical move to attract more young voters to the GOP.
lead_paragraph: Many of the youngest leaders of the Republican Party are embracing views on some social issues that are at odds with traditional conservative ideology.

headline.seo: Young Republicans Erase Lines on Social Issues
headline.main: Young in G.O.P. Erase the Lines on Social Issues
headline.print_headline: Young in G.O.P. Erase the Lines On Social Issues
